columns.staff_id: The unique identifier for each staff member.
columns.staff_details: The name and title of the staff member.

Staff.table_description: The table stores information about staff members involved in the workflow.

columns.staff_role_code: The unique code identifying each staff role.
columns.staff_role_description: The detailed description of the staff role.

Ref_Staff_Roles.table_description: The table stores reference data for various staff roles.

columns.process_outcome_code: The unique code for each process outcome.
columns.process_outcome_description: The detailed description of the process outcome.

Process_Outcomes.table_description: The table stores outcomes associated with various document processes.

columns.process_status_code: The unique code for each process status.
columns.process_status_description: The detailed description of the process status.

Process_Status.table_description: The table stores statuses related to document processing workflows.

columns.author_name: The unique name of the author.
columns.other_details: The additional information about the author.

Authors.table_description: The table stores authors and their associated details for documents.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document.
columns.author_name: The name of the author associated with the document.
columns.document_description: The detailed overview of the document's content.
columns.other_details: The additional information relevant to the document.

Documents.table_description: The table stores documents along with their authors and descriptions.

columns.process_id: The unique identifier for each business process.
columns.next_process_id: The identifier for the subsequent process in the workflow.
columns.process_name: The name assigned to the business process.
columns.process_description: The detailed explanation of the business process.
columns.other_details: The additional information related to the business process.

Business_Processes.table_description: The table stores details of various business processes in the workflow.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document in the process.
columns.process_id: The unique identifier for each business process conducted.
columns.process_outcome_code: The code indicating the outcome of the document processing.
columns.process_status_code: The code representing the current status of the document process.

Documents_Processes.table_description: The table stores relationships between documents and their associated processes.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document involved in the process.
columns.process_id: The unique identifier for each business process related to the document.
columns.staff_id: The unique identifier for each staff member associated with the process.
columns.staff_role_code: The code representing the role of the staff member in the process.
columns.date_from: The start date and time of the staff member's involvement.
columns.date_to: The end date and time of the staff member's involvement.
columns.other_details: The additional information related to the staff member's role.

Staff_in_Processes.table_description: The table stores staff assignments for specific documents and processes.
